metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17003 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Scanning a QR code that contained a javascript: URL would have resulted in the Javascript being executed.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 22.04, the firefox package is just a script that installs the Firefox snap firefox for ios

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
